doc:
Judith Ivey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Judith_Ivey 0 Judith Lee Ivey (born September 4, 1951) is an American actress and theatre director. She received two Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in a Play for her performances in Steaming (1981) and Hurlyburly (1984). Ivey also appeared in several films and television series. For her role in What the Deaf Man Heard (1997), she was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Limited Series or Movie. Judith_Lee_Ivey ( born September_4_,_1951 ) is an_American_actress_and_theatre_director . She received two_Tony_Award for Best_Featured_Actress in a_Play for her_performances in Steaming ( 1981 ) and Hurlyburly_(_1984_) . Ivey also appeared in several_films_and_television_series . For her_role in What the_Deaf_Man Heard (_1997_) , she was_nominated for a_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actress in a_Limited_Series or Movie .
